title: A1
description: Find all proteins involved in the 'Muscle contraction' pathway.

version_1.cypher_query: MATCH (p:Protein)-[:hasPathway]->(path:Pathway {label: 'Muscle contraction'})  RETURN DISTINCT p.label LIMIT 100
cypher_result: RANGRF MOG1 RANGNRF HSPC165 HSPC236 MDS5

title: A2
description: Retrieve all functional domains associated with the 'KCNC2' protein.

version_1.cypher_query: MATCH (p:Protein {label: 'KCNC2'})-[:hasFunctionalDomain]->(fd:FunctionalDomain) RETURN DISTINCT fd.label LIMIT 100

title: A3
description: List all diseases the protein 'CFTR' is implicated in.

version_1.cypher_query: MATCH (p:Protein {label: 'CFTR'})-[:implicatedInDisease]->(d:Disease) RETURN DISTINCT d.label LIMIT 100
cypher_result: Congenital bilateral aplasia of vas deferens
Bronchiectasis With Or Without Elevated Sweat Chloride 1

title: A4
description: Find all proteins interacting with the light ion channel 'KCNQ3'.

version_1.cypher_query: MATCH (lic:LightIonChannel {label: 'KCNQ3'})-[:interact]-(p:Protein)  RETURN DISTINCT p.label LIMIT 100

title: A5
description: List all biological processes the protein 'CFTR' is involved in.

version_1.cypher_query: MATCH (p:Protein {label: 'CFTR'})-[:hasBiologicalProcess]->(bp:BiologicalProcess) RETURN DISTINCT bp.label LIMIT 100

title: A6
description: Retrieve all molecular functions associated with the dark ion channel 'KCNG3'.

version_1.cypher_query: MATCH (d:DarkIonChannel {label: 'KCNG3'})-[r:hasMolecularFunction]->(m:MolecularFunction) RETURN DISTINCT m.label LIMIT 100

title: A7
description: Find all cellular components the protein 'CFTR' is associated with.

version_1.cypher_query: MATCH (p:Protein {label: 'CFTR'})-[:hasCellularComponent]->(c:CellularComponent) RETURN DISTINCT c.label LIMIT 100

title: A8
description: List all chemicals associated with the 'Chemical and Drug Induced Liver Injury' disease.

version_1.cypher_query: MATCH (d:Disease {label: 'Chemical and Drug Induced Liver Injury'})<-[:assoWithDisease]-(c:Chemical) RETURN DISTINCT c.label LIMIT 100

title: A9
description: Retrieve all ions associated with the light ion channel 'HTR3E'.

version_1.cypher_query: MATCH (lic:LightIonChannel {label: 'HTR3E'})-[:hasIonAsso]->(ion:Ion)  RETURN DISTINCT ion.label LIMIT 100

title: A10
description: Find all proteins that have the PTM 'Prkaa2'

version_1.cypher_query: MATCH (p:Protein)-[:hasPTM]->(ptm:PTM {label: 'Prkaa2'}) RETURN DISTINCT p.label LIMIT 100

title: A11
description: List all dark ion channels that interact with the 'CACNB1' protein.

version_1.cypher_query: MATCH (p:Protein {label: 'CACNB1'})-[:interact]-(d:DarkIonChannel) RETURN DISTINCT d.label LIMIT 100

title: A12
description: List all the ion channels from the family TRP.

version_1.cypher_query: MATCH (f:Family {label: 'TRP'})<-[:hasFamily]-(ic:LightIonChannel) RETURN DISTINCT ic.label LIMIT 100 UNION MATCH (f:Family {label: 'TRP'})<-[:hasFamily]-(ic:DarkIonChannel) RETURN DISTINCT ic.label LIMIT 100

title: A13
description: Which family has the largest number of dark ion channels?

version_1.cypher_query: MATCH (d:DarkIonChannel)-[:hasFamily]->(f:Family) WITH f, COUNT(d) AS darkIonChannelCount ORDER BY darkIonChannelCount DESC RETURN DISTINCT f.label LIMIT 100

title: A14
description: List all dark ion channels that belong to the family labeled 'Unclassified'.

version_1.cypher_query: MATCH (d:DarkIonChannel)-[:hasFamily]->(f:Family) WHERE f.label = 'Unclassified' RETURN DISTINCT d.label LIMIT 100

title: A15
description: What molecular functions are associated with light ion channels that belong to the 'GABA' family?

version_1.cypher_query: MATCH (lic:LightIonChannel)-[:hasFamily]->(f:Family {label: 'GABA'}) MATCH (lic)-[:hasMolecularFunction]->(mf:MolecularFunction) RETURN DISTINCT mf.label LIMIT 100
cypher_result: extracellular ligand-gated monoatomic ion channel activity
transmitter-gated monoatomic ion channel activity involved in regulation of postsynaptic membrane potential
neurotransmitter receptor activity involved in regulation of postsynaptic membrane potential
inhibitory extracellular ligand-gated monoatomic ion channel activity
ligand-gated monoatomic ion channel activity involved in regulation of presynaptic membrane potential
G protein-coupled neurotransmitter receptor activity involved in regulation of presynaptic membrane potential

title: A16
description: List all the ions and gating mechanisms for the 'K' family of dark ion channels.

version_1.cypher_query: MATCH (family:Family {label: 'K'})<-[:hasFamily]-(darkIonChannel:DarkIonChannel) MATCH (darkIonChannel)-[:hasIonAsso]-(ion:Ion) MATCH (darkIonChannel)-[:hasGateMechanism]-(gateMechanism:GateMechanism) RETURN DISTINCT ion.label AS Ion, gateMechanism.label AS GateMechanism LIMIT 100

title: A17
description: Find all proteins involved in the 'Fatty acid metabolism' pathway.

version_1.cypher_query: MATCH (p:Protein)-[:hasPathway]->(path:Pathway {label: 'Fatty acid metabolism'}) RETURN DISTINCT p.label LIMIT 100
cypher_result: ACSL1 FACL1 FACL2 LACS LACS1 LACS2

title: B1
description: Find all light ion channels that are involved in the same biological process as the protein 'CFTR'.

version_1.cypher_query: MATCH (p:Protein {label: 'CFTR'})-[:hasBiologicalProcess]->(bp:BiologicalProcess)<-[:hasBiologicalProcess]-(lic:LightIonChannel) RETURN DISTINCT lic.label LIMIT 100

title: B2
description: Find all dark ion channels that are involved in the same pathway as the 'CACNG6' dark ion channel.

version_1.cypher_query: MATCH (d1:DarkIonChannel {label: 'CACNG6'})-[:hasPathway]->(p:Pathway)<-[:hasPathway]-(d2:DarkIonChannel) RETURN DISTINCT d2.label LIMIT 100

title: B3
description: Find all diseases that are linked to proteins that bind to the 'ferric oxide' chemical.

version_1.cypher_query: MATCH (c:Chemical {label: 'ferric oxide'})-[:assoWithGene]-(p:Protein) MATCH (p)-[:implicatedInDisease]-(d:Disease) RETURN DISTINCT d.label LIMIT 100
cypher_result: Chemical and Drug Induced Liver Injury

title: B4
description: Find all functional domains that the protein 'CFTR' shares with other proteins.

version_1.cypher_query: MATCH (p:Protein {label: 'CFTR'})-[:hasFunctionalDomain]->(fd:FunctionalDomain) MATCH (other:Protein)-[:hasFunctionalDomain]->(fd) RETURN DISTINCT fd.label LIMIT 100

title: B5
description: Find all the proteins that are associated with the same pathways and conduct the same ions as the protein 'KCNG3'.

version_1.cypher_query: MATCH (p:Protein {label: 'KCNG3'})-[:hasPathway]->(pw:Pathway)<-[:hasPathway]-(p2:Protein) MATCH (p)-[:hasIonAsso]->(i:Ion)<-[:hasIonAsso]-(p2) RETURN DISTINCT p2.label LIMIT 100

title: B6
description: List all biological processes that are connected to chemicals associated with the protein 'TRPM8'.

version_1.cypher_query: MATCH (protein:Protein {label: 'TRPM8'})-[:assoWithGene]-(chemical:Chemical) MATCH (chemical)-[:assoWithBiologicalProcess]-(biologicalProcess:BiologicalProcess) RETURN DISTINCT biologicalProcess.label LIMIT 100
cypher_result: positive regulation of reactive oxygen species biosynthetic process
positive regulation of release of sequestered calcium ion into cytosol
positive regulation of monoatomic ion transmembrane transport
positive regulation of G2/M transition of mitotic cell cycle
negative regulation of cell population proliferation
positive regulation of cytosolic calcium ion concentration
positive regulation of cysteine-type endopeptidase activity involved in execution phase of apoptosis
positive regulation of reactive oxygen species metabolic process
positive regulation of response to endoplasmic reticulum stress
positive regulation of adipose tissue development
positive regulation of glutathione peroxidase activity
positive regulation of apoptotic DNA fragmentation
positive regulation of cellular response to oxidative stress
host-mediated regulation of intestinal microbiota composition
positive regulation of neuron apoptotic process
activation of protein kinase B activity
negative regulation of neuron projection development
positive regulation of type 2 immune response
release of cytochrome c from mitochondria
formation of cytoplasmic translation initiation complex
positive regulation of NF-kappaB transcription factor activity
positive regulation of superoxide anion generation
positive regulation of proteasomal ubiquitin-dependent protein catabolic process

title: B7
description: Identify all pathways that connect the dark ion channel 'CACNG3' to diseases through proteins implicated in those diseases.

version_1.cypher_query: MATCH (d:DarkIonChannel {label: 'CACNG3'})-[:hasPathway]->(p:Pathway) MATCH (p)<-[:hasPathway]-(prot:Protein)-[:implicatedInDisease]->(disease:Disease) RETURN DISTINCT disease.label LIMIT 100
cypher_result: Exfoliative Ichthyosis, Autosomal Recessive, Ichthyosis Bullosa of Siemens-like

title: B8
description: Retrieve all molecular functions associated with proteins implicated in 'Seizures' disease.

version_1.cypher_query: MATCH (d:Disease {label: 'Seizures'})<-[:implicatedInDisease]-(p:Protein) MATCH (p)-[:hasMolecularFunction]->(mf:MolecularFunction) RETURN DISTINCT mf.label LIMIT 100
cypher_result: oxidoreductase activity, acting on paired donors, with incorporation or reduction of molecular oxygen
oxidoreductase activity, acting on NAD(P)H, heme protein as acceptor
oxidoreductase activity, acting on paired donors, with incorporation or reduction of molecular oxygen, NAD(P)H as one donor, and incorporation of one atom of oxygen
active monoatomic ion transmembrane transporter activity

title: B9
description: Retrieve the functional domains of proteins that are associated with the chemical 'ferric oxide'.

version_1.cypher_query: MATCH (c:Chemical {label: 'ferric oxide'})-[:assoWithGene]->(p:Protein)-[:hasFunctionalDomain]->(f:FunctionalDomain)  RETURN DISTINCT f.label LIMIT 100

title: C1
description: Which family and group does the ion channel 'HTR3E' belong to?

version_1.cypher_query: MATCH (ic:LightIonChannel {label: 'HTR3E'})-[:hasFamily]->(f:Family) MATCH (f)-[:hasGroup]->(g:Group) RETURN DISTINCT f.label AS Family, g.label AS Group LIMIT 100

title: C2
description: Find all ion channels that are connected to the 'Neuronal System' pathway through interacting proteins.

version_1.cypher_query: MATCH (p:Pathway {label: 'Neuronal System'})<-[:hasPathway]-(protein:Protein) MATCH (protein)-[:interact]-(ionChannel) WHERE (ionChannel:LightIonChannel OR ionChannel:DarkIonChannel) RETURN DISTINCT ionChannel.label LIMIT 100

title: C3
description: List the functional domains that are present in the light ion channels of the Chloride channels group.

version_1.cypher_query: MATCH (g:Group {label: 'Chloride channels'}) MATCH (f:Family)-[:hasGroup]->(g) MATCH (lic:LightIonChannel)-[:hasFamily]->(f) MATCH (lic)-[:hasFunctionalDomain]->(fd:FunctionalDomain) RETURN DISTINCT fd.label LIMIT 100

title: C4
description: Which ions are connected to the chemical 'Ozone' through biological processes that involve proteins?

version_1.cypher_query: MATCH (c:Chemical {label: 'Ozone'})-[:assoWithGene]->(p:Protein) MATCH (p)-[:hasBiologicalProcess]->(bp:BiologicalProcess) MATCH (bp)<-[:hasBiologicalProcess]-(p2:Protein) MATCH (p2)-[:hasIonAsso]->(i:Ion) RETURN DISTINCT i.label LIMIT 100
